oneOf.title: Format
oneOf.description: Alternative formats of the same document, such as PDF, HTML, or XML.

oneOf.title: Portal
oneOf.description:
Websites that provide access to alternative versions of this document or request
modifications. May also allow access to other or previous business documents.

oneOf.title: Request
oneOf.description: Documents related to requests submitted to other systems.

oneOf.title: Response
oneOf.description: Response documents sent from third party systems often in reply to requests.

oneOf.title: Agreement
oneOf.description: Contracts or agreements related to this document.

oneOf.title: Verification
oneOf.description:
Evidence or verification documents that can be used to validate the authenticity
of this document.

oneOf.title: Attachment
oneOf.description:
General attachments for related information such as spread sheets, letters,
presentations, specifications, etc.

category.title: Category
category.description:
Category helps classify the link according to a fixed list. This is optional
but highly recommended as it helps receivers better understand the purpose
of the link and potentially how its should be presented.

key.description:
Key is a unique identifier for the link within the header and category
if provided.

code.title: Code
code.description: Code used to identify the contents of the link.

title.title: Title
title.description: Title of the resource to use when presenting to users.

description.title: Description
description.description: Description of the resource to use when presenting to users.

mime.title: MIME Type
mime.description:
Expected MIME type of the link's content when the content is a file. Can only
be one of the allowed types defined by EN 16931-1:2017 plus XML itself.

digest.title: Digest
digest.description:
Digest is used to verify the integrity of the destination document
when downloaded from the URL.

Link.description: Link defines a link between this document and another resource.
